actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 in relation to expenses for care of certain dependents.

summary.text: Increases to $1,000 (and to $1,500 for two or more dependents) the limitation on deductions allowable under the Internal Revenue Code to a taxpayer for expenses for household and child care services necessary for gainful employment. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 214(b)(1))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 in relation to expenses for care of certain dependents.
